EmailTemplate.name: February 2016.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for the February Town Hall
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there, Bigcommerce Town Hall <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5863786043245097730]]>
When: Tuesday February 23, 2016 from 2–3 PM CT
What: A discussion of Bigcommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A
Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and CPO Tim Schulz
Reserve your spot <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5863786043245097730]]>
We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community forum <[[http://forum.bigcommerce.com/f67/february-town-hall-coming-soon--27865/]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the forum
Hope to see you there,
The Bigcommerce Team
